text: kya tumane unako nahin dekha, jisane ibaraaheem se usake rab ke silasile mein jhagada kiya tha, is kaaran ki allaah ne usako raajy de rakha tha? jab ibaraaheem ne kaha, "mera rab vah hai jo jilaata aur maarata hai." usane kaha, "main bhee to jilaata aur maarata hoon." ibaraaheem ne kaha, "achchha to allaah soory ko poorab se laata hai, to too use pashchim se le aa." isapar vah adharmee chakit rah gaya. allaah zaalim logon ko seedha maarg nahin dikhaata
